questions.question_text:
A technician is running updates on a Windows PC. Some of the updates install properly, while others appear as failed. While troubleshooting, the technician restarts the PC and attempts to install the failed updates again. The updates continue to fail.
Which of the following is the FIRST option to check?

choices.B: Look up the error number associated with the failed update
choices.A: Visit the Microsoft Update website to see if there is an issue with a specific update
choices.C: Look at the system Event Viewer to find more information on the failure
choices.D: Download the failed update to install manually

discussion.content: OBJ-3.2: If an automated system update fails to install, you should research the error number for the failed update to determine if the issue is a known error. Based on the error code, you can then determine the best method to overcome the issue. For example, a common cause of errors is inadequate space on the hard disk. If a technician needs to determine how to best solve this issue, researching the error code at Microsoft.com can help.
B. While the Event Viewer is an important Windows tool, the error code should give the most accurate depiction of what went wrong with the updates.

questions.question_text: Which of the following Windows versions introduced using applications in the Metro interface?

choices.B: Store backups on premises and burst to the public cloud if needed
choices.C: Store backups both on premises and in a public cloud infrastructure
choices.D: Store all the backups in a public cloud with no on-premises backup storage
choices.A: Store 30 days of backups on premises and then age the backups to the public cloud

discussion.content: The other options do not fully meet all the requirements. For example, options B and C involve storing all backups on-premises, which could lead to higher hardware costs. Option D does not provide readily available recent backups on-premises. So, option A is the best choice given the specific requirements...Its ok question..
Agree with Samsonite, no offence but ppl questioning even this one should go for CompTia ITF + exam first, then try A+

comments.content: Thought exactly same. Backup on both platforms and backup on premises are delete if order than 30 days, but as is not in the options i think A applies great

discussion.content: Interesting answer. I agree its A but I would store the initial 30 days on premises and on the cloud. If the premises falls we only have back ups from over 30 days ago. Our org gets a lot done in 30 days LOL
Here I am seeing 5 comments thinking the question is controversial and people are actually talking about it...smh. Anyways I agree with A being the right answer

✑ There should be minimum expenditure on hardware.
Which of the following satisfies all of these requirements?

Joe, a technician, is configuring advanced security settings on a SOHO router. Joe cannot locate the settings he intends to change, but the online vendor documentation has instructions for configuring those settings. Which of the following should the technician perform?

discussion.content:
Joe, the technician, should check for a firmware update on the SOHO router. Firmware updates often include enhancements, bug fixes, and additional features, which might address the missing or hidden settings Joe is looking for. 
By ensuring the router’s firmware is up-to-date, Joe can access the latest security options and improve the overall functionality of the device.
